TITLE: Hestia Capital could be preparing to shake up the board at Pitney Bowes
SUMMARY: The shipping company could benefit from a slimmed-down structure and tweaks to its board.

TITLE: Blackstone chief defends real estate fund amid rush for withdrawals
SUMMARY: Blackstone President and COO Jon Gray defended the fund, noting that investors knew BREIT had limits on redemptions.

TITLE: Just 8% of Americans have a positive view of cryptocurrencies now, CNBC survey finds
SUMMARY: The survey shows 43% of the public with a negative view of cryptocurrencies, up from 25% in March.

TITLE: Jamie Dimon says Ukraine war shows we still need cheap, secure energy from oil and gas
SUMMARY: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon discussed the future of energy on CNBC's "Squawk Box" on Tuesday.

TITLE: U.S.-listed Chinese stocks give up earlier gains as investor digest reopening shift
SUMMARY: The rally came as some big cities including Beijing and Shenzhen are taking steps to ease Covid testing requirements and quarantine rules.

SUMMARY: TipRanks analyst ranking service pinpoints Wall Street's best-performing stocks, including CrowdStrike and Analog Devices.

SUMMARY: On the same day that Bob Iger returned to Disney, there was also news that Trian Fund Management snapped up a stake in the entertainment giant.

TITLE: Goldman Sachs warns traders of shrinking bonus pool as Wall Street hunkers down
SUMMARY: Wall Street is grappling with sharp declines in revenue after parts of the industry involved in taking companies public and issuing stocks and bonds seized up.

SUMMARY: TipRanks analyst ranking service pinpoints Wall Street's best-performing stocks, including Disney and Nvidia.

TITLE: Warren Buffett explains his $750 million charitable donation on Thanksgiving eve
SUMMARY: The legendary investor said the donation is his way of giving thanks to his children for their charitable work.

SUMMARY: Few companies embody fintech's rise and fall as much as Dave, one of a new breed of digital banking providers taking on the likes of JPMorgan Chase.
